Posts.Content: My advice would be to do a strand test. You will then see what it does to the hair. If you go to a hairdresser they can do this for you. X
Posts.Title: Letrozole and hair color

Posts.Content: Yes people do like to scaremonger. This site is the best support group there is. X
Posts.Title: Letrozole and hair color

Posts.Content: I suppose you could say ive had a double mastectomy as i had one taken off 2 yrs ago and the other in september.  I dont have triple neg though. Im glad i had the second mastectomy as they found a 3mm primary in there as well!! So definatley no regrets. I hope this has been of some help to you. Xx
Posts.Title: Mastectomy worry

Posts.Content: hello. You must be very worried. There isn't much advice I can give you. But I can assure you that we are all here to give you support. I would think that the docs will take your husbands medications into consideration. I'm sorry I cant be more help. Hopefully someone who can will pick up this tread. I Hope it all works out for you. Sending positive thoughts to you both. X
Posts.Title: Decisions to make, all so overwhelming

Posts.Content: im on tamoxifen, I have achy knees all the time. I'm glad it's not just me. I also get pains in my thighs and I only get the occasional hot flush. (lucky me) I get through the day with paracetamol and take a tramadol at night if I need to. Hope you are ok otherwise. X
Posts.Title: Aches and pains ....... still!!!

Posts.Content: Ive been on tamoxifen for over a year and most of the side effects seem to have subsided. I get the odd hot flush and some nausea but it doesnt stop me living my day to day life. I still run my own business 7 days a week. Hope this helps.

Posts.Title: Left mastectomy results

Posts.Title: Left mastectomy results

Posts.Content: i was the same. Felt tired and fed up all the time. A routine scan showed my cancer. I had no idea i had it until then as id always had a lumpy breast since my teens. Since treatment started i feel better, but some days are worse than others.
Posts.Title: Feeling old and tired before diagnosis.

Posts.Content: hi laura0403, my situation is very similar to your mums. I had to go back to hospital for my MRI results and was booked in for surgery within 2 weeks. The team have to discuss the results before they see your mum. That way they can explain everything clearly. I hope this helps. Sending positive thoughts your way. X
